content: आस्रवः [आस्रु-अप्] {@--1@} Pain, affliction, distress. {@--2@} Flowing, running. {@--3@} Discharge, emission. {@--4@} Fault, transgression. {@--5@} The foam on boiling rice. {@--6@} (With Jainas) The impulse called योग or attention which the soul participates in the movement of its various bodies; it is defined as the ‘action of the senses which impels the soul towards external objects’; it is good or evil according as it is directed towards good or evil objects.
